description:
The Demon Lord Krebskulm has awakened due to Alicia`s betrayal. Diablo stands alone against Klem, her mind consumed by hatred. Shera races to Rem`s side. An army of Fallen led by Edelgard marches on Faltra, and the curtain rises on their final battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La bataille du vrai et du faux
